labels.customRequest: Contact us for a tailor-made stay

home.title: Les Étoiles du Rocher
home.subtitle: Your haven of peace on the French Riviera

content.quote: « There are places where the spirit breathes. »
content.description1: Picture a place where luxury meets authenticity, where every detail has been crafted for your comfort. Our estate, nestled just 5 minutes from Monaco, offers you the perfect balance between absolute tranquility and privileged access to the most beautiful beaches, luxury boutiques, and events on the French Riviera.
content.description2: Immerse yourself in a 350 m² universe spread over two floors, where five private suites welcome you with exceptional bedding. A discreet guesthouse, nestled in Mediterranean vegetation, awaits to host your guests in an idyllic setting.
content.description3: Let yourself be seduced by our infinity pool that blends into the marine horizon, and discover our rooftop offering a breathtaking panorama of Monaco and the Mediterranean.
content.description4: Between intimacy, elegance, and the art of living, our estate is the perfect setting for an unforgettable getaway on the Riviera.

interior.receptionDesc: An elegant space for your convivial moments
interior.salonDesc: An elegant living space with panoramic view
interior.kitchenDesc: Equipped with the latest high-end appliances
interior.masterDesc: A haven of peace with sea view

interior.nightDesc: A magical atmosphere under the stars

home.description: Discover an exceptional place where luxury and authenticity meet to create unforgettable moments.

hero.title: Les Étoiles du Rocher
hero.subtitle: Let yourself be enchanted by the golden morning rays, the discreet song of pine trees, and the endless horizon of the Mediterranean.

home.quote: The beauty of a place reveals itself in the caress of light, the silence that inhabits it, and the emotion it evokes.

villa.title: The Villa Les Étoiles du Rocher
villa.description: A jewel set facing the sea, where every detail invites contemplation. Upon waking, the whisper of waves and the azure view will compose your first memory of the day. The refined volumes, open to the exterior, offer a subtle sensory experience, combining sophistication and Riviera authenticity.

gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.description: Immerse yourself in the unique atmosphere of the spaces: light-bathed suites, a pool suspended above the sea, a rooftop with poetic accents...

mainSuite.title: Master Suite
mainSuite.description: A serene parenthesis, bathed in clarity, with a view of the water and a private bathroom.

livingRoom.title: Living Room
livingRoom.description: Open volume, large bay windows, and an infinite perspective on the azure.

terrace.title: Terrace
terrace.description: A plateau in the open sky, designed for your moments of tranquility and outdoor dining.

surroundings.title: Surroundings
surroundings.description: Explore nearby treasures, chosen for their character and discretion.

monaco.title: Monaco & Menton
monaco.description: Hanging gardens, intimate museums, confidential addresses.

italy.title: Escape to Italy
italy.description: Markets of Ventimiglia, Ligurian flavors, dolce vita within reach.

trails.title: Secret paths of the French Riviera
trails.description: Perched villages, quiet coves, preserved panoramas.

surroundings.guide: We will be your guides to compose a stay according to your finest desires.

contact.title: Contact & Reservation
contact.description: For any request or to organize your private visit, our team responds with discretion and promptness.

hero.title: Mediterranean horizon
hero.description: Suspended between sky and sea, Villa Les Étoiles du Rocher invites you to savor the sweetness of the French Riviera, a refuge perched facing the infinite azure.
hero.subtitle: Let yourself be enchanted by the golden morning rays, the discreet song of pine trees, and the endless horizon of the Mediterranean.

spaces.title: Spaces Designed to Inspire
spaces.description: Each room at Les Étoiles du Rocher has been designed to blend subtle comfort, delicate lines and memorable moments.

pool.title: Private pool
pool.description: Water mirror extended by the horizon.

suites.title: Five suites
suites.description: Intimate retreats, flooded with natural light.

privacy.title: Preserved privacy
privacy.description: Generous volumes and framed views guarantee your tranquility while inviting the landscape inside.

harmony.title: Harmony of materials
harmony.description: Clean lines, selected finishes, and noble materials combine for a warm and contemporary atmosphere.

wellness.title: Refined well-being
wellness.description: Every detail — bedding, lighting, textures — is orchestrated for absolute, discreet, and uncompromising tranquility.

features.artOfLiving: The art of living is drawn in these places where every glance crosses a line of attention dedicated to your pleasure.

location.title: French Riviera: a privileged site
location.description: Perched between Monaco and Menton, the villa enjoys a rare setting, combining a private Mediterranean garden with quick access to the treasures of the French Riviera.

services.title: Tailored services
services.description: Your stay is composed according to your desires: discreet welcome, 24/7 concierge, private chef, confidential excursions... Each moment is written to your measure.

excellence.title: Excellence at your service
excellence.description: Our exceptional team anticipates your wishes with subtle intuition. From private events to reservations at the most sought-after establishments, we take care of the perfect organization of each moment of your stay.

technical.title: Comfort and technologies at the service of your well-being
technical.description: Les Étoiles du Rocher benefits from the latest innovations to guarantee you absolute comfort. Advanced home automation system, invisible air conditioning, perfect sound insulation... Every technical detail has been designed to be forgotten and let you fully enjoy the present moment.

experience.title: Why choose Les Étoiles du Rocher
experience.description: Beyond a simple stay, this residence is a promise of escape where each material, each perspective, and each service combine their talents to reveal the quintessence of Mediterranean sweet living.

commitment.title: Our Commitment
commitment.quote: "Offering our guests authentic moments, where the art of hospitality mingles with the most delicate discretion."

exceptional.title: An exceptional property
exceptional.description: An architectural jewel recently built, offering from each space a breathtaking panorama, in an environment of absolute tranquility.

harmony.title: Harmony & authenticity
harmony.description: A symphony of noble materials, silent technologies, and careful arrangements, serving a sensory experience of subtlety.

service.title: Attentive service
service.description: A dedicated team, anticipating your wishes to compose tailor-made moments, reflecting your most delicate aspirations.

island.title: Central island
island.description: Marble central island with integrated storage space and designer stools.

appliances.title: High-end appliances
appliances.description: Gaggenau equipment with integrated refrigerator, steam oven and induction cooktop.

dining.title: Dining area
dining.description: Solid oak table that can accommodate up to 8 people.

livingSpaces.title: Discover our spaces
livingSpaces.description1: Each space at Les Étoiles du Rocher has been designed to offer you comfort, elegance and unforgettable moments.
livingSpaces.description2: Enjoy 350 m² spread over two floors, with five private suites featuring exceptional bedding.
livingSpaces.description3: A discreet guesthouse, nestled in Mediterranean vegetation, offers additional space for your guests.
livingSpaces.description4: Discover our infinity pool overlooking the sea and our rooftop offering an exceptional panorama of Monaco and the Mediterranean.

sink.description: Undermount stainless steel sink with pull-out faucet and variable flow for more flexibility.

dishwasher.title: Smart dishwasher
dishwasher.description: Integrated dishwasher with eco program and automatic load detection for optimized consumption.

fridge.title: Combined refrigerators
fridge.description: Combined refrigerator-freezer with No-Frost compartments and special fresh zone for sensitive foods.

oven.title: Oven and microwave
oven.description: Multifunction oven with steam function and combined microwave for quick and healthy cooking.

stove.title: Cooktop
stove.description: Induction cooktop with 5 cooking zones and variable bridge to adapt to all types of pans.

whyChooseUs.title: Why choose this villa?
whyChooseUs.description: It's a true rare gem, brand new and ready to enhance your stay. Whether for a relaxing vacation or a luxury getaway, you'll be won over by its high-end amenities and unique location.

hero.title: Mediterranean Horizon
hero.description: Suspended between sky and sea, Les Étoiles du Rocher invites you to savor the sweetness of the French Riviera, a haven perched facing infinite azure.

technical.title: Technical Excellence & Comfort
technical.description: The latest innovations, designed to disappear, offer you a soothing environment: integrated home automation, invisible air conditioning, acoustic insulation, 24/7 security and ultra-fast WiFi.

experience.title: SIGNATURE EXPERIENCE: WHY LES ÉTOILES DU ROCHER
experience.description: Beyond a simple stay, this residence is a promise of escape where each material, each perspective and each service combine their talents to reveal the quintessence of the Mediterranean sweetness of life.

exceptional.description: A recently built architectural jewel, offering from each space a breathtaking panorama, in a setting of absolute tranquility.

harmony.title: Harmony & authenticity
harmony.description: A symphony of noble materials, silent technologies and meticulous arrangements, serving a sensory experience of subtle sophistication.

discover.title: Discover
discover.subtitle: Explore the wonders of the French Riviera from Les Étoiles du Rocher.

hero.title: The sky and sea experience
hero.subtitle: Enjoy the heights of the French Riviera, a haven of peace with breathtaking views of the Mediterranean.

events.title: Places & Events to Discover
events.description: Discover our selection of must-visit places and events during your stay in our exceptional villa.

fortAntoine.title: Night Walk at Fort Antoine
fortAntoine.description: An open-air theater located on the heights of Monaco, Fort Antoine hosts intimate artistic performances under the stars. Enjoy a show in this historic venue, facing the sea, in a unique atmosphere blending culture, heritage and nocturnal magic.

monacoGP.title: Monaco Grand Prix
monacoGP.description: Experience the legendary race from our villa or with our VIP access to the best stands on the circuit.

casino.title: Monte-Carlo Casino
casino.description: Try your luck at the legendary casino where James Bond is a regular. Belle Époque architecture and sophisticated atmosphere.

oceanographic.title: Oceanographic Museum
oceanographic.description: More than 6000 marine species, giant aquariums and interactive exhibitions in a majestic building overlooking the sea.

rally.title: Monte-Carlo Historic Rally
rally.description: Admire vintage cars traveling the winding roads of the countryside during this prestigious competition.

customsPath.title: Customs Officers Path
customsPath.description: Preserved coastal walk offering spectacular views of the sea and secret coves of the French Riviera.

ezeVillage.title: Èze Village
ezeVillage.description: Perched at 429m altitude, this medieval village offers a 360° view of the French Riviera and houses the famous Exotic Garden.

littleAfrica.title: Little Africa in Beaulieu
littleAfrica.description: Secret botanical garden housing rare exotic species and an intimate beach away from the crowds.

corbusier.title: Le Corbusier Path
corbusier.description: Architectural route along the sea revealing iconic villas, including Eileen Gray's famous Villa E-1027.

garnier.title: Monte-Carlo Garnier Opera House
garnier.description: Architectural masterpiece usually closed to the public, but accessible during exclusive guided tours that we can organize.

blueGulf.title: Blue Gulf
blueGulf.description: Secret cove accessible only by a discreet path or by sea, offering crystal clear waters and rare tranquility.

cta.title: Your unique experience on the French Riviera
cta.description: Enjoy all these exceptional places from your luxury villa at Les Étoiles du Rocher. Our concierge team is at your disposal to organize your excursions and create unforgettable tailor-made moments.

terms.title: General Terms & Conditions
terms.content:
General Terms & Conditions
Villa Les Étoiles du Rocher
The rental of Villa Les Étoiles du Rocher, owned by SAS ALPHA GROUP, is governed by these General Terms, which the tenant fully and unconditionally accepts upon signing the rental agreement.

1. Maximum Occupancy
The villa accommodates a maximum of 10 people (including children). Exceeding this number is strictly prohibited and may result in immediate termination of the stay without refund.

2. Parties, Noise & Quiet Hours
Parties, gatherings, or events are strictly forbidden.
No excessive noise is permitted between 7:00 AM and 10:00 PM to respect neighbors.
Violations may lead to police intervention and immediate eviction without refund.

3. Pets
Pets are not allowed unless prior written approval is obtained from SAS ALPHA GROUP. Unauthorized pets will result in immediate contract termination at the tenant's expense.

4. Property Use
The tenant agrees to:
Use the villa peacefully and exclusively for vacation purposes.
Respect the house rules, property, equipment, and neighbors.

5. Access & Security
Keys, badges, and access devices are strictly personal and must be returned upon departure.
Lost items will be charged for replacement.
The tenant must secure doors, gates, and alarms when leaving the villa.

6. Cleanliness & Condition
The villa is delivered clean and in perfect condition. The tenant must return it in a similar state. Additional cleaning fees may apply if not respected.

7. Image & Intellectual Property Rights
All photos, videos, and visuals of the villa are the exclusive property of SAS ALPHA GROUP.
Unauthorized use, reproduction, or exploitation is prohibited and will lead to legal action.

8. Surveillance & Security
For security reasons, certain outdoor areas may be under video surveillance (compliant with local laws). No cameras are installed in private or indoor spaces.

9. Liability & Insurance
The tenant is fully responsible for damages, losses, or deterioration caused to the villa or its contents.
Travel insurance covering rental liability is strongly recommended.

10. Acceptance
Signing the rental agreement constitutes full acceptance of:
These General Terms,
The General Terms of Sale,
And the House Rules.

sales.title: General Terms and Conditions of Sale
sales.content:
General Terms and Conditions of Sale
1. Booking
The reservation of the villa Les Étoiles du Rocher, owned by SAS ALPHA GROUP, is considered firm and final only after:
Receipt of a 50% deposit of the total stay amount,
And the signing of a rental contract established for each booking.
The rental contract must be drafted and signed by both parties before any access to the property is granted.
The remaining balance must be paid in full no later than 60 days before arrival. Failure to pay by this deadline may result in automatic cancellation without refund of the deposit.

2. Security Deposit
A €5,000 security deposit is required upon arrival. It will be refunded within 15 days after departure, minus any deductions for damages, breaches of regulations, or additional costs.

3. Cancellation
Any cancellation by the client will result in the following conditions:
More than 90 days before arrival: 70% refund of the deposit,
Between 90 and 60 days: 50% refund of the deposit,
Between 60 and 30 days: No refund of the deposit,
Less than 30 days before arrival: No refund, the full stay amount remains due.
There is no right of withdrawal.

4. Arrival & Departure
Check-in: From 4:00 PM,
Check-out: By 10:00 AM.
Any unauthorized delay will result in additional charges.

5. Capacity & Usage
Maximum occupancy: 10 people (including children).
Strictly prohibited: Parties, events, or receptions.
No excessive noise between 7:00 AM and 10:00 PM.
No pets allowed unless prior written approval.
Violations may result in immediate termination of the contract with no refund.

6. House Rules
The guest must comply with the house rules provided upon arrival. Serious violations (damages, disturbances, breach of prohibitions) may lead to loss of the deposit and legal action.

7. Additional Services
Extra services (private chef, butler, concierge, etc.) must be booked at least 15 days before arrival. Modifications/cancellations require 7 days' notice; otherwise, full payment is due.

8. Image & Intellectual Property Rights
All photos, videos, and visuals of the villa are the exclusive property of SAS ALPHA GROUP. Unauthorized reproduction or use is strictly prohibited.

9. Liability
The guest is responsible for damages caused by themselves or their companions. Travel insurance is mandatory and may be requested upon arrival.

10. Disputes
In case of disputes, parties will seek an amicable solution. Otherwise, jurisdiction falls to the courts where the villa is located.
